channel.title: Future Core - The core technology of the future world! | New base!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b]Future Core - The core technology of the future revealed![/b][/size][/center] [center][img]http://europeandcis.undp.org/blog/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/future450.jpg[/img] [b]Base: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=569791.0]Solace[/url][/b][/center]
Future Plans: [url=http://www.amazingben.com/rpg-warcraft.mid]How's this as login background music?[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,594355.0.html]Weapon Attributes System![/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,533185.0.html]Custom Login Screen (Maybe few of my modifications so I might not exactly use it)[/url]
[u][b]Introduction[/b][/u] I want to test my limits. I want to go beyond what my limit of possible is. I want to learn new things. I want to make a new aspect of rsps. Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence. And as for creativity. Creativity is just connecting things. When you ask creative people how they did something, they feel a little guilty because they didn't really do it, they just saw something. It seemed obvious to them after a while. That's because they were able to connect experiences they've had and synthesize new things. I have a vision, a new world of my creativity. A world that is MY way.
[u][b]Purpose[/b][/u] Well, I think I should've done this first (before FroyoScape). I plan on putting my programming skills to the max in this project. I hope to achieve wonderful things with this side project. [b]This server is going to be released, not hosted, due to this project being a LEARNING project.[/b] This server is a side project. I will work hard on it though.
[code=Update Log] Date - Description 12/26/2012 - Started project. [/code] [code=Bugs List] Date - How disastrous (Huge, Medium, Easy) - Description - Fixed? - (Optional) Comments [/code]
Pics to come..
[hr]
Please support me!
If anyone could, can you please make a banner for this?

item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

imsuperman05:

If you want to learn new things, then move on to a better base, god damn it. I’m tired of people saying they want to do something different, but never really do anything about it, but work on content that was already made.

Shh. I have a secret project that uses Runesource that I worked on like 5 months back but accidentally deleted :/.

Eek! I said that?

When I’m finished with this, Imma try using RuneSource/Solace.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Everyone wants 317 loading 600+. This is for those. FroyoScape is for the ones who want 317 loading 319. and Hellz-End (our rsps partnership) wants 637/639.

So B. It.

By my programming skills to the max, I mean by unique content.

Read full topic
item.source: Future Core - The core technology of the future world! | New base!

item.title: Future Core - The core technology of the future world! | New base!
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

ewwwwwwwwww why caution-x?

if you really want to do something different and creative, but still with winterLove use a blakescape, crash patch it, get it to use non-blocking io/nio, redo packet handling, implement a task system, delete some of the useless code and fix the conventions and you’re good…

I mean if you want to do something different and unleash your potential why start off with a base full of content. Blakescape requires you add update masks to the updating block to get gfx’s, animations, hitsplats, directions, and other things to work. That would teach you more then starting off with a full base full of content.

Adding the things I also suggested would teach you a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Future Core - The core technology of the future world! | New base!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Future Core - The core technology of the future revealed![/size][/center]
[center]
Base: Solace[/center]

Future Plans:
How’s this as login background music?
Weapon Attributes System!
Custom Login Screen (Maybe few of my modifications so I might not exactly use it)

Introduction
I want to test my limits. I want to go beyond what my limit of possible is. I want to learn new things. I want to make a new aspect of rsps. Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence. And as for creativity. Creativity is just connecting things. When you ask creative people how they did something, they feel a little guilty because they didn’t really do it, they just saw something. It seemed obvious to them after a while. That’s because they were able to connect experiences they’ve had and synthesize new things. I have a vision, a new world of my creativity. A world that is MY way.

Purpose
Well, I think I should’ve done this first (before FroyoScape). I plan on putting my programming skills to the max in this project. I hope to achieve wonderful things with this side project. This server is going to be released, not hosted, due to this project being a LEARNING project. This server is a side project. I will work hard on it though.

Date - Description
12/26/2012 - Started project.
Date - How disastrous (Huge, Medium, Easy) - Description - Fixed? - (Optional) Comments

Pics to come…

[hr]

Please support me!

If anyone could, can you please make a banner for this?
